text.Prompt:
Using the product keywords and product title, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Product title:
925 Sterling Silver Open Celtic Around Oval Blue Stone Pendant Necklace 18"- Nickel Free

Product keywords:
Pendant Size: 1.4x 2.8cm. Silver Chain Length: 18''
Weight: 2.4 g.
High quality .925 sterling silver
Natural Blue Topaz Stone
Packaging: Black Velvet Pouch
Matching earrings available. Search Amazon by KEA0007SIL

Product description:
text.Response A: Here is a perfect blue topaz stone pendant necklace for you. It is made of high-quality 925 sterling silver. The chain length is 18 inches. The pendant is 1.4x 2.8 cm. It comes with a black velvet pouch. If you need matching earrings, please search Amazon by KEA0007SIL.
text.Response B:
Hey there! 👋

Ooh, look at this pretty pendant! 💎 It's made of shiny silver and has a gorgeous blue stone in the center. 🔵 The silver is super high quality and the stone is totally natural. 💥

The pendant is just the right size - not too big, not too small. 👌 It's 1.4x 2.8cm, so it's just big enough to be noticed, but not so big that it's overwhelming. 💕

The chain is long enough to wear with anything - 18 inches is a great length! 👗 And the best part? It's made of nickel-free silver, so it's safe for your skin. 🌟

Want to know the best part? There are matching earrings available too! 👂 Just search Amazon for KEA0007SIL to find them. 🔍

So, what do you say? Are you ready to add some sparkle to your outfit? 💃🏻 Click the link to get your hands on this gorgeous pendant necklace! 💥

meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
